short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract RSS Feed from youtube channels with ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Title: YouTube RSS Getter - Extract RSS Links from YouTube Channels

Description:

YouTube RSS Getter is your go-to Chrome extension for effortlessly extracting RSS links from your favorite YouTube channels. Whether you're a content creator, curator, or just a YouTube enthusiast, this tool simplifies the process of gathering RSS feeds for efficient content tracking.

**Features:**

**Free Version:**
- Extract RSS links from up to 10 YouTube channels at once.
- Output option: Copy the RSS links directly to your clipboard.

**Premium Version:**
Unlock the full potential with our premium version and enjoy additional features:
- Extract RSS links from more than 10 YouTube channels simultaneously.
- Select specific channels for targeted RSS link extraction.
- Explore versatile output formats, including:
  - Copy OPML content directly to your clipboard.
  - Download your curated list of RSS links as an OPML file for easy integration with your preferred RSS reader.

Whether you're managing multiple channels, conducting research, or organizing content, YouTube RSS Getter empowers you with flexibility and efficiency. Upgrade to the premium version for an enhanced experience and take control of your YouTube content tracking today.

Download YouTube RSS Getter now and streamline your RSS link extraction process!

*You can get a channel URLs list from your subscriptions with: 
"Subscriptions Importer for YouTube" Chrome Extension!
https://bit.ly/subscriptions-importer-for-yt
